name: Electric Piano
description: Smooth electric piano using algorithm 2 with parallel modulation

performance.notes: Smooth FM electric piano using Algorithm 2 (parallel carriers). Operators 1 and 2 are carriers (1:1 ratio for detuned unison). Operator 6 (high ratio 14) adds harmonic sparkle. Operators 3 and 4 modulate carriers for brightness. Soft attack (0.01s) for smooth transients. Medium decay (0.8s) for natural decay. Velocity controls brightness.
performance.technique: Algorithm 2 = parallel carriers. Use 1:1 ratio for detuned unison. High-ratio operator (14) adds sparkle. Parallel modulation creates rich, complex tone. Velocity sensitivity for dynamic playing. Classic DX7 electric piano technique.
performance.tip: Use parallel carriers for rich tone. High-ratio operators add sparkle. Velocity sensitivity adds dynamics. Add chorus for extra width.

algorithmDescription: Algorithm 2: Op6 → Op1 + Op2, Op3 → Op1, Op4 → Op2, All → Output (parallel)
